overview: Curl up with exclusive contract starlet Serenity for a technicolor celebration of her most wicked lesbian fantasies. Colorful all-girl vignettes are brought to life by eleven of the most gorgeous women in adult. Stephanie Swift, Temptress, and Devinn Lane are just a few of vixens who join the Wicked girl in this classic tale of girl meets girls.
tagline: Ever wonder what really happens at those late-night photo shoots?
title: Flash!
